html:
Subscribe to The Big Number

Apple Podcasts | Spotify | YouTube

On the latest episode of The Big Number, Tom Haberstroh & Dan Devine look at Steph Curry‚Äôs incredible offensive impact on the Golden State Warriors. With just as much offensive dominance both on and off the ball, is Steph the greatest offensive player since Michael Jordan? Even more so than LeBron James?

But it‚Äôs not just Steph Curry giving the Warriors the boost they need to be title contenders‚ÄîGolden State is over a dozen players deep with other stars with as Draymond Green and Andrew Wiggins which Dan highlights with four more numbers.

Tom & Dan end the show with some over/under predictions for Golden State throughout the rest of the NBA season.
